xal.sim.scenario

Class ElementMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.sim.scenario.ElementMapping
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultElementMapping, FileBasedElementMapping

    public abstract class ElementMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class to provide mapping from SMF nodes to online model elements

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultConverter

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends IComponent> getDefaultConverter()
        Default converter should produce a general model element like a Marker. It is used when no other converters have been found.
        Returns:
        default converter

      • createDrift

        public abstract IComponent createDrift(java.lang.String name,
                                       double len)
                                throws ModelException
        Different model may have different implementation of the drift element.
        Returns:
        drift model element
        Throws:
        ModelException

      • getConverter

        public java.lang.Class<? extends IComponent> getConverter(AcceleratorNode node)
        Returns converter for the given node. Default implementation traverses a list and returns first good converter.
        Parameters:
        node - the SMF node
        Returns:
        converter for this node
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException

        value - the converter
